n.detail:
Scythe Blade: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +10 to hit against all targets within a 5 ft. arc, 4d10 slashing damage

details.floor: Hewn Stone (DC 10 to charge or run)
details.history: The dungeon was created by a cult of elemental fire as a lair. It was eventually abandoned by its creators, and the dungeon has been conquered and altered many times since then.
details.illumination: Shadowy (phosphorescent fungus or candles every 20 ft.)

settings.name: The Sanctum of the Lich Princess

wandering_monsters.1: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp, gathered around an evil shrine
wandering_monsters.2: Mimic (cr 2, mm 220); deadly, 450 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.3: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316) and 1 x Zombie (cr 1/4, mm 316); deadly, 500 xp, gathered around an evil shrine
wandering_monsters.4: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316); deadly, 450 xp, lost and desperate
wandering_monsters.5: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp, scavenging for food and treasure
wandering_monsters.6: Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 150 xp, searching for an object stolen from their lair
